welcomePage.textStage: The application was written by the GRAf MAY team as part of the 3rd stage of training in RS School React 2023 Q1.
welcomePage.textApp1: The application also includes the ability to authorize/authenticate the user through firebase to ensure that only authorized users have access to the tool.
welcomePage.textApp2: As well as localization into two languages (Russian and English). Implemented adaptive design and semantic layout.
welcomePage.textApp3: The application is written in React using new features. When writing, typescript, sass were used.
welcomePage.textHeader: GraphiQL is a playground/IDE for graphQL queries.
